kv19.8:7.1: Atthi lokiyo mano, atthi lokiyaṃ manindriyanti?
kv19.8:7.3: Atthi lokiyā saddhā, atthi lokiyaṃ saddhindriyanti?
kv19.8:7.6: atthi lokiyo mano, atthi lokiyaṃ manindriyanti?
kv19.8:7.8: Atthi lokiyā paññā, atthi lokiyaṃ paññindriyanti?
kv19.8:8.1: Atthi lokiyaṃ somanassaṃ, atthi lokiyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ … pe …
kv19.8:8.3: atthi lokiyaṃ jīvitaṃ, atthi lokiyaṃ jīvitindriyanti?
kv19.8:8.5: Atthi lokiyā saddhā, atthi lokiyaṃ saddhindriyanti?
kv19.8:8.8: atthi lokiyaṃ jīvitaṃ, atthi lokiyaṃ jīvitindriyanti?
kv19.8:8.10: Atthi lokiyā paññā, atthi lokiyaṃ paññindriyanti?
kv19.8:9.1: Atthi lokiyā saddhā, natthi lokiyaṃ saddhindriyanti?
kv19.8:9.3: Atthi lokiyo mano, natthi lokiyaṃ manindriyanti?
kv19.8:9.6: atthi lokiyā paññā, natthi lokiyaṃ paññindriyanti?
kv19.8:9.8: Atthi lokiyo mano, natthi lokiyaṃ manindriyanti?
kv19.8:10.1: Atthi lokiyā saddhā, natthi lokiyaṃ saddhindriyanti?
kv19.8:10.3: Atthi lokiyaṃ somanassaṃ, natthi lokiyaṃ somanassindriyanti …
kv19.8:10.4: atthi lokiyaṃ jīvitaṃ, natthi lokiyaṃ jīvitindriyanti?
kv19.8:10.7: atthi lokiyā paññā, natthi lokiyaṃ paññindriyanti?
kv19.8:10.9: Atthi lokiyo mano, natthi lokiyaṃ manindriyanti … pe …
kv19.8:10.11: atthi lokiyaṃ jīvitaṃ, natthi lokiyaṃ jīvitindriyanti?
kv19.8:11.1: Atthi lokuttarā saddhā, atthi lokuttaraṃ saddhindriyanti?
kv19.8:11.3: Atthi lokiyā saddhā, atthi lokiyaṃ saddhindriyanti?
kv19.8:11.8: atthi lokuttarā paññā, atthi lokuttaraṃ paññindriyanti?
kv19.8:11.10: Atthi lokiyā paññā, atthi lokiyaṃ paññindriyanti?
kv19.8:12.1: Atthi lokiyā saddhā, natthi lokiyaṃ saddhindriyanti?
kv19.8:12.3: Atthi lokuttarā saddhā, natthi lokuttaraṃ saddhindriyanti?
kv19.8:12.8: atthi lokiyā paññā, natthi lokiyaṃ paññindriyanti?
kv19.8:12.10: Atthi lokuttarā paññā, natthi lokuttaraṃ paññindriyanti?
kv19.8:13.4: “addasaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento satte apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe, tikkhindriye mudindriye, svākāre, suviññāpaye, appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassāvino viharante”ti.
kv19.8:16.1: Atīte kilese jahati anāgate kilese jahati paccuppanne kilese jahati, suññatā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā, sāmaññaphalaṃ asaṅkhataṃ, patti asaṅkhatā, sabbadhammānaṃ tathatā asaṅkhatā, nibbānadhātu kusalā, atthi puthujjanassa accantaniyāmatā, natthi lokiyāni pañcindriyānīti.
